text: Ate usadi'am nisani'am vicom ika iha vi hai ki uha tuhanu dara ate umida de nala bijali'am dikha'unda hai. Phira uha asamana tom pani var'ha'unda hai. Phira usa nala dharati nu usade mritaka ho jana tom ba'ada ji'unda karada hai. Besaka isa vica unham lokam la'i nisani'am hana jihare budhi tom kama lainde hana
